tool.name: RaceID differential gene expression analysis
tool.command:
Rscript '@SCRIPT_DIR@/raceID_diffgenes.R' '@SCRIPT_DIR@' '$rconf_source'; #if $gen_final_heat.value == "T" or $compare_clusters_select.do_compare_clusters.value == "T": mkdir '${out_html.files_path}' && cp plot_*.png '${out_html.files_path}' && echo ' RaceID Differential Gene Analysis

' > '$out_html' #end if

configfiles.configfile:
sc = readRDS( '$inp_rdat' ) output_rdat = '$out_rdat'
c_pval = as.numeric( '$pval' ) generate_finheat = as.logical( '$gen_final_heat.value' ) generate_extable = as.logical( '$gen_gexpr_table.value' ) outtable_dir = 'tables' generate_robject = as.logical( '$final_rdata.value' ) compare_clusters = as.logical( '$compare_clusters_select.do_compare_clusters.value' )
#if $compare_clusters_select.do_compare_clusters.value == "T": gene_name = '$compare_clusters_select.gene' clust1 = '$compare_clusters_select.cl1' clust2 = '$compare_clusters_select.cl2' mcount = as.integer( '$compare_clusters_select.mincount' ) #end if

param.name: inp_rdat
param.label: Count matrix with clusters
param.help: This file can be generated from a spreadsheet via the RaceID filter tool, but should preferably be the output of the RaceID outlier tool.

param.name: pval
param.label: Retain genes with p-value smaller than threshold
param.help: The p-value for observing the difference in mean expression between the cluster and all cells based on binomial counting statistics.

param.name: gen_gexpr_table
param.label: Generate table of all differentially expressed genes?

param.name: gen_final_heat
param.label: Generate a heatmap of the final clustering?

param.name: do_compare_clusters
param.label: Compare the expression of a specific gene between two sets of clusters?

param.name: cl1
param.label: Cluster set 1
param.help: e.g. if you wish to compare cluster 2 to clusters 1 and 3, then type '2' here and '1,3' in the next input.

param.name: cl2
param.label: Cluster set 2
param.help: You can also compare sets of clusters to one another: e.g. 1,4,5 against 2,3.

param.name: mincount
param.label: Only count genes with more than this number of transcripts in at least one cell within cl1 or cl2
